Locale.e: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Do NOT Taunt Happy Fun Ball!

Battle strider with a powerful area attack. Can step up and down cliffs. Can be targeted by anti-air weapons.

Can attack ground units.
Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
The Colossus can walk up and down cliffs.
Upgrades the damage dealt by Protoss ground units.
Further upgrades the damage dealt by Protoss ground units.
Maximizes the damage dealt by Protoss ground units.
Upgrades the armor of Protoss ground units.
Further upgrades the armor of Protoss ground units.
Maximizes the armor of Protoss ground units.
Upgrades the shields of all Protoss units and structures.
Further upgrades the shields of all Protoss units and structures.
Maximizes the shields of all Protoss units and structures.
Increases the range of the <font color="#ffff8a">Colossus</font> weapon.
Enables additional units and research options. A Tech Lab can fit onto any production structure.
Cancels construction of this structure, destroying the structure and giving a partial refund.
Upgrades the armor of <font color="#ffff8a">structures</font> by 2.
Allows 2 units to be created simultaneously.

An Infested Terran does moderate damage and lasts for 21 seconds.

Can attack ground and air units.
Buries the unit underground. Burrowed units are unable to move or attack, but they cannot be seen without detection.
Upgrades the armor of all Zerg ground units.
Further upgrades the armor of all Zerg ground units.
Maximizes the armor of all Zerg ground units.
Upgrades the attacks of all Zerg ground ranged units.
Further upgrades the attacks of all Zerg ground ranged units.
Maximizes the attacks of all Zerg ground ranged units.

Enables all Zerg ground units to use the Burrow ability. Burrow allows a unit to take cover underground, rendering it unable to attack. A burrowed unit is invisible unless revealed by detectors or effects.
This cocoon contains a Zergling that is morphing into a Baneling.
Sends constructed units to the designated point. Workers rallied to resources will begin gathering automatically.

Suicide unit. Does damage over a small area on death.

Can attack ground units.
The Baneling detonates where it is standing, damaging nearby enemy units and structures.

Allows Banelings to automatically target structures.

Banelings deal 80 damage to structures.

Prevents Banelings from automatically targeting structures. Banelings can still be explicitly ordered to attack structures.

Banelings deal 80 damage to structures.
Further upgrades all Zerg melee attacks.
Increases the movement speed of <font color="#ffff8a">Banelings</font>.

Ultimate Protoss vessel. Can use Photon Overcharge, Mass Recall, and Time Warp abilities. Cloaks nearby friendly units and structures.

Can attack ground and air units.
Warps spacetime within the target area for 7 seconds. Enemy ground units that enter the field have their movement speed reduced by 40%.
Recalls all units owned by the player in the target area to the Caster.

Cloaking Field passively cloaks friendly nearby units and structures.

Passive ability.
Upgrades the damage dealt by Protoss air units.
Further upgrades the damage dealt by Protoss air units.
Maximizes the damage dealt by Protoss air units.
Upgrades the armor of Protoss air units.
Further upgrades the armor of Protoss air units.
Maximizes the armor of Protoss air units.

Uses a laser to shoot down enemy missiles.
Cannot target special attacks.
Times out after 14 seconds.

Each shot consumes 10 energy.

Automated defensive laser that intercepts enemy projectiles.

Effective against Marauders, Vikings, Banshees, Battlecruisers, Cyclones, Thors, Missile Turrets, Stalkers, Phoenixes, Tempests, Photon Cannons, Mothership Cores, Nexus, Queens, Mutalisks, Corruptors, Hydralisks, Ravagers, Locusts, and Spore Crawlers.

Each shot consumes 10 energy.

Adds +1 range to <font color="#ffff8a">Auto-Turrets</font>, <font color="#ffff8a">Missile Turrets</font>, <font color="#ffff8a">Planetary Fortresses</font>, and <font color="#ffff8a">Point Defense Drones</font>.

Changelings cannot attack. When a Changeling first encounters an enemy unit, it will match that unit's color and change into a Zealot, Marine, or Zergling, depending on the enemy race. Dies after 107 seconds.
Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Scan-moving units will not engage enemies.
Matches the color and race of the first enemy unit the Changeling comes in contact with.

Powerful melee warrior.

Can attack ground units.

General-purpose infantry.

Can attack ground and air units.

Fast melee creature. Can morph into a Baneling.

Can attack ground units.

Primary structure. Used to receive gathered resources. Can use the Lift Off ability and can upgrade into an Orbital Command or a Planetary Fortress.

Enables:
- SCVs
Halts construction of this structure. The partial construction will remain.
Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Loads nearby SCVs into Command Center.
Transforms structure into a slow air unit for redeployment. May not produce units, research upgrades, or use abilities until it has landed.

Upgrades Command Center to a Planetary Fortress, greatly increasing its armor and arming it with a powerful defensive turret. Cannot lift off.

Can attack ground units.
Cancels the upgrade order, returning the structure to its original state.
Upgrades Command Center to an Orbital Command, unlocking Scanner Sweep, Calldown: MULE, and Calldown: Extra Supplies. Cannot load SCVs.

Basic worker unit. Can gather resources, build Terran structures, and repair.

Can attack ground units.

Provides supply.
Supply allows you to create more units.
Supply Depots can be lowered to allow units to walk over them.
Lowers the structure, allowing ground units to move across it.
Built over a Vespene Geyser to allow harvesting of vespene gas.

Infantry-production facility.

Enables:
- Marines
- Reapers
- Bunkers from SCVs
- Orbital Commands from Command Centers

Infantry-research structure. A Tech Lab can fit onto any production structure.

Enables:
- Marauders
- Ghosts with Ghost Academy

Raider. Can jump up and down cliffs. Regenerates life quickly while out of combat. Can use KD8 Charge.

Can attack ground units.

Sniper. Can use Snipe, EMP Round, and be upgraded to use Cloak. Can call down Tactical Nukes built at the Ghost Academy.

Can attack ground and air units.

Heavy assault infantry.

Can attack ground units.

Contains upgrades for Terran infantry and structures.

Enables:
- Missile Turrets from SCVs
- Sensor Towers from SCVs
- Planetary Fortresses from Command Centers
Upgrades the damage dealt by infantry units.
Further upgrades the damage dealt by infantry units.
Maximizes the damage dealt by infantry units.
Upgrades the armor of infantry units.
Further upgrades the armor of infantry units.
Maximizes the armor of infantry units.

Anti-air defensive structure.

Can attack air units.
Detector
Targets and attacks the target unit until it is destroyed or moves out of range.
This unit can detect cloaked, burrowed, and hallucinated units.

Defensive structure.
Infantry fights from inside.

Bonus: +1 range to units inside.
Salvages the structure, removing it and returning 75% of its mineral and gas value. Salvage takes 4 seconds to finish. Warning: once Salvage is triggered, it cannot be canceled.
Sends unloaded infantry units to designated point.
Orders Marines and Marauders inside of the Bunker to use Stimpacks. They will take damage and have increased attack speed as normal.
Targets and attacks the target unit until it is destroyed or moves out of range.
Built over a Vespene Geyser to allow harvesting of vespene gas.
Reveals the locations of enemy units at long range. The Sensor Tower's detection area is visible to the enemy.
Able to expose enemy movements within its radar capability. Does not reveal the area.

Contains upgrades for Ghosts. Can build Nukes for Ghosts.

Enables:
- Ghosts at the Barracks
Enables <font color="#ffff8a">Ghosts</font> to use the Cloak ability. Cloak renders a unit invisible to enemies unless it's revealed by detectors or effects.

Arms the Silo with a Tactical Nuke.

Nukes take 14 seconds to land, but they deal up to 300 (+200 vs. structures) damage in a large radius.

Use a Ghost to designate the target.

Vehicle-production facility.

Enables:
- Hellions
- Widow Mines

Vehicle-research structure. A Tech Lab can fit onto any production structure.

Enables:
- Siege Tanks
- Thor with Armory
- Cyclones

Heavy tank. Can switch into Siege Mode to provide long-range artillery support.

Can attack ground units.

Heavy assault mech.

Can attack ground and air units.

Fast scout. Has a flame attack that damages all enemy units in its line of fire. Can transform into a close range combat unit.

Can attack ground units.

Close range combat unit. Deals damage in a small frontal cone. Can transform into a fast scout unit.

Can attack ground units.

Mobile assault vehicle. Can use Lock On to quickly fire while moving.

Can attack ground and air units.

Robotic mine. Launches missiles at nearby enemy units while burrowed. Attacks deal splash damage in a small area around the target.

Can attack ground and air units.

Air-unit production facility.

Enables:
- Vikings
- Medivacs

Aircraft-research structure. A Tech Lab can fit onto any production structure.

Enables:
- Banshees
- Ravens
- Battlecruisers with Fusion Core
Air transport. Heals nearby biological units. Can use Afterburners.

Tactical-strike aircraft. Can be upgraded to use cloak.

Can attack ground units.

Aerial support unit. Can use Auto-Turret, Point Defense Drone, and Seeker Missile.

Detector

Powerful warship. Can use Yamato Cannon and Tactical Jump.

Can attack ground and air units.

Durable support flyer. Loaded with strong anti-capital air missiles. Can switch into Assault Mode to attack ground units.

Can attack air units.

Artillery fighter. Loaded with missiles that deal area damage to enemy air targets. Can switch into Defender Mode to provide siege support.

Can attack air units.

Contains weapon and armor upgrades for Factory and Starport units.

Enables:
- Hellbat at the Factory
- Thor at the Factory
Upgrades the damage dealt by ground vehicles.
Further upgrades the damage dealt by ground vehicles.
Maximizes the damage dealt by ground vehicles.
Upgrades the damage dealt by units built at a Starport.
Further upgrades the damage dealt by units built at a Starport.
Maximizes the damage dealt by units built at a Starport.
Upgrade Vehicle and Ship Plating Level 1
Upgrades the armor of units built at a Factory or Starport.
Upgrade Vehicle and Ship Plating Level 2
Further upgrades the armor of units built at a Factory or Starport.
Terran Vehicle And Ship Plating Level 1
Upgrade Vehicle and Ship Plating Level 3
Maximizes the armor of units built at a Factory or Starport.
Terran Vehicle And Ship Plating Level 2

Contains Battlecruiser upgrades.

Enables:
- Battlecruisers at the Starport
Enables use of the <font color="#ffff8a">Battlecruiser</font> Yamato Cannon.
Increases the range of <font color="#ffff8a">Liberators</font> in Defender Mode by 4.
Increases the energy regeneration rate of <font color="#ffff8a">Medivacs</font> by 100%.

Automated defensive turret. Times out after 8 seconds.

Can attack ground and air units.

Heavy tank. Can switch into Tank Mode to provide mobile tank support.

Can attack ground units.
Reverts to Tank Mode. In this mode Siege Tanks can move, but they do less damage.
Terran Vehicle And Ship Plating Level 3
Deploys into Siege Mode. In this mode Siege Tanks have very long range and inflict area damage. Siege Tanks in this mode cannot move or attack targets at close range.

Durable support unit. Can switch into Fighter Mode to attack air units.

Can attack ground units.
Transforms the Viking to Fighter Mode. In this mode Vikings fly, but they can only attack air targets.

Allows <font color="#ffff8a">Hellions</font>, <font color="#ffff8a">Hellbats</font>, <font color="#ffff8a">Vikings</font>, and <font color="#ffff8a">Thors</font> to transform quickly between combat modes.
Transforms the Viking to Assault Mode. In this mode Vikings move on the ground and can only attack ground targets.
Primary structure. Must land to receive resources, produce units, or use abilities.
Lands the structure at a target location, allowing it to once again produce units, research upgrades, and use abilities.

Enables <font color="#ffff8a">Marines</font> and <font color="#ffff8a">Marauders</font> to use the Stimpack ability. Stimpacks cause damage to a unit, but they increase its attack and movement speeds for a short time.
Upgrades the <font color="#ffff8a">Marauder</font> weapons to slow down opponents.

Improves the Hellion's Infernal Flamethrower to deal +5 damage vs. light units.

Does not affect Hellbat.
Allows <font color="#ffff8a">Widow Mines</font> to burrow and activate three times as fast.
Increases the move speed of <font color="#ffff8a">Cyclones</font>.

Enables <font color="#ffff8a">Banshees</font> to use the Cloak ability. Cloak renders the <font color="#ffff8a">Banshee</font> invisible to enemies unless the unit is revealed by detectors or effects.
Increases the movement speed of <font color="#ffff8a">Banshees</font>.
Allows <font color="#ffff8a">Ravens</font> to use the Interference Matrix ability.
Factory must land to start unit production.

Vehicle-research structure. A Tech Lab can fit onto any production structure.

Enables:
- Siege Tanks
- Thor with Armory
- Cyclones
Starport must land to start unit production.

Aircraft-research structure. A Tech Lab can fit onto any production structure.

Enables:
- Banshees
- Ravens
- Battlecruisers with Fusion Core
Restores life to mechanical units and structures at the cost of resources.
Orders SCV to gather resources from a selected Mineral Field or Vespene Geyser.
Returns the carried resources to the nearest drop-off point.
Orders the unit to apply your currently selected spray to the terrain at the target location.
Barracks must land to start unit production.

Provides supply.
Supply allows you to create more units.
Supply Depots can be lowered to allow units to walk over them.
Raises the structure, preventing ground units from moving across it.
Injects the unit with powerful stimulants that greatly increase attack and movement speeds for a few seconds. Injures the unit for 10 of the unit's life.
Explodes after a short delay, doing 10 damage and knocking back nearby units.
Reapers can jump up and down cliffs.
Regenerates life quickly while out of combat.

Cloaks the unit, preventing enemy units from seeing or attacking it. A cloaked unit will only be revealed by detectors or effects.

Drains 1.3 energy per second.
Decloaks the selected unit, making it visible to enemies.

After carefully aiming for 1.43 seconds while not taking damage, the Ghost fires a sniper round dealing 130 damage. Ignores armor.

Can only target biological units.
Calls down a Nuclear Strike at a target location. Nukes take 14 seconds to land, but they deal up to 300 (+200 vs. structures) damage in a large radius.
Orders selected units to holster their weapons and avoid engaging enemies, unless given a direct command. Units holding fire will flee if attacked.
Creates an electromagnetic pulse that does 100 damage to shields and energy of all units in the targeted area. Cloaked units hit by EMP are revealed for a short time.
Orders selected units to fire at will. They will engage enemy units within range and chase them as normal.
Injects the unit with powerful stimulants that greatly increase attack and movement speeds for a few seconds. Injures the unit for 20 of the unit's life.

Units hit by the Marauder are temporarily slowed.

Massive units are immune.
Activates the Thor's 250mm Punisher Cannons. Punisher cannons strike a single air target for heavy damage.

Close range combat unit. Deals damage in a small frontal cone. Can transform into a fast scout unit.

Can attack ground units.

Heals a friendly biological target.

Heals 13 life per 1 energy.
Loads units into the Medivac's hold.
Increases the Medivac's movement speed by 70% for 6 seconds.

Cloaks the unit, preventing enemy units from seeing or attacking it. A cloaked unit will only be revealed by detectors or effects.

Drains 1.3 energy per second.

Disables a target unit rendering it unable to attack or use abilities for 11 seconds. Reveals Cloaked units.

Can target mechanical and psionic units.
Deploys a missile which pursues the target unit and, upon contact, reduces the armor and shield armor of affected units by 2 for 21 seconds.
Blasts a target with a devastating plasma cannon, causing 300 damage.

After 4 seconds, warps to the target location. Battlecruiser is invulnerable while warping.

Does not require vision.

Primary structure. Can receive gathered resources. Can use the Chrono Boost ability.

Enables:
- Probes
- Mothership Core
Places target structure in a Chrono Boost, causing it to operate 50% faster for 20 seconds.
Recalls all units owned by the player in the target area to the Nexus.
Overcharges a target Shield Battery near a Nexus, increasing its shield restoration rate by 50% and allowing it to restore shields without consuming energy for 14 seconds.

Basic worker unit. Can gather resources and warp in Protoss structures.

Can attack ground units.

Provides supply.
Supply allows you to warp in more units.
Creates power for nearby structures.
Increases the speed of warp in for units warped into the power field to 4 seconds.
Warped in over a Vespene Geyser to allow harvesting of vespene gas.

Warps in Protoss ground units.

Enables:
- Zealots
Upgrades this Gateway to a Warp Gate, allowing it to warp in ground units to any location powered by a Pylon or Warp Prism.

Ranged support strider.

Can attack ground and air units.
Potent psionic master. Can use Feedback and be upgraded to use Psionic Storm. Can transform into an Archon.

Deadly warrior-assassin. Cloak renders the unit invisible to enemies without detection. Can transform into an Archon.

Can attack ground units.

Energy-manipulator unit. Can use Force Field, Guardian Shield, and Hallucination.

Can attack ground and air units.

Ranged specialist. Can use Psionic Transfer.

Can attack ground units.
Enables <font color="#ffff8a">Gateways</font> to upgrade to Warp Gates.

Contains weapon and armor upgrades for Protoss ground units and shield upgrades for all Protoss units and structures.

Enables:
- Photon Cannons from Probes

Contains upgrades for Phoenixes and Carriers.

Enables:
- Tempests at the Stargate
- Carriers at the Stargate
- Mothership from the Mothership Core
Increases the speed and acceleration of the <font color="#ffff8a">Void Ray</font>.
Improves the <font color="#ffff8a">Tempest's</font> weapon to deal +0 damage vs structures.
Contains upgrades for Zealots, Stalkers, and Adepts.
Allows <font color="#ffff8a">Zealots</font> to intercept nearby enemies. Also increases the movement speed of <font color="#ffff8a">Zealots</font>.
Allows <font color="#ffff8a">Stalkers</font> to teleport to a nearby target location.
Increases the attack speed of <font color="#ffff8a">Adepts</font> by 45%.

Primary defensive structure.

Can attack ground and air units.
Detector

Warps in Protoss air units.

Enables:
- Phoenixes

Air-superiority fighter.

Can attack air units.

Capital ship. Can build and launch Interceptors to make attacks.

Can attack ground and air units.

Surgical strike craft.

Can attack ground and air units.
Flying caster. Can use Revelation, Stasis Ward, and Pulsar Beam.

Siege artillery craft. Attacks from long range. Can use Disintegration.

Can attack ground and air units.

Enables:

Allows <font color="#ffff8a">Dark Templars</font> to teleport to a nearby target location.

Allows Zealots to intercept nearby enemies. Also increases the movement speed of Zealots. Ability can only be used once every 7 seconds.
Teleports the Stalker to a nearby target location. Ability can only be used once every 7 seconds.
Creates a storm of psionic energy that lasts 3 seconds, causing up to 80 damage to all units in the target area.

Sacrifices 2 Templar to create an Archon.

Can attack ground and air units.
Drains all energy from the target. Deals 1 damage per point of energy.
Teleports the Dark Templar to a nearby target location. Ability can only be used once every 14 seconds.
The Dark Templar is permanently cloaked.
Barrier that lasts 11 seconds and impedes movement of ground units. Massive units will shatter Force Fields on contact.
Creates a range 4 aura that reduces incoming ranged damage to friendly units by 2. Lasts 11 seconds.
This hallucinated copy functions like the original unit, but it cannot use active abilities, cannot deal damage, and dies more easily. Hallucinations last 43 seconds before they disappear.
This hallucinated copy functions like the original unit, but it cannot use active abilities, cannot deal damage, and dies more easily. Hallucinations last 43 seconds before they disappear.

These hallucinated copies function like the original unit, but they cannot use active abilities, deal damage, warp in structures, or gather resources, and they die more easily. Hallucinations last 43 seconds before they disappear.

Makes the target unit float in the air, disabling its abilities. Effect lasts up to 7 seconds.

Builds Interceptors that automatically attack the Carrier's target. Carriers may not attack without Interceptors.

Can attack ground and air units.
Realigns the Void Ray's Prismatic Beam to gain +6 damage vs. armored units for 14 seconds.
Transforms the Warp Prism to Phasing Mode and generates a power radius similar to that of a Pylon. The Warp Prism cannot move in this mode.
Loads units into the Warp Prism's matrix.
Transforms the Observer to Surveillance Mode. The Observer gains 25% wider vision, but loses the ability to move.
Absorbs up to 100 damage. Lasts for 0 seconds.
Orders Probe to gather resources from a selected Mineral Field or Vespene Geyser.
Defensive structure. Recharges shields of nearby units.

Combat drones that automatically strafe their Carrier's target. Carriers may not attack without Interceptors.

Can attack ground and air units.

Primary structure. Used to spawn all Zerg units and receive gathered resources. Grows creep used to feed nearby Zerg structures. Can mutate into a Lair.

Bonus: Zerg move faster on creep.

Evolved version of the Hatchery that allows additional upgrades and structures to be produced. Also spawns all Zerg units and receives gathered resources.

Enables:
- Overseers from Overlords
Cancels the mutation order, returning the structure to its original state.
Sends morphed units to the designated point.
Sends morphed worker units to the designated point. Workers rallied to Mineral Fields or Extractors will begin gathering automatically.
Increases the movement speed of <font color="#ffff8a">Overlords</font> and <font color="#ffff8a">Overseers</font>.

Defensive unit. Can use Spawn Larvae, Spawn Creep Tumor, and Transfusion. Moves much faster on creep.

Can attack ground and air units.

A burrowed creep generator. Creep feeds nearby Zerg structures. A Creep Tumor can spawn one additional Creep Tumor.

Bonus: Zerg move faster on creep.
Mutated over a Vespene Geyser to allow harvesting of vespene gas.

Contains upgrades for Zerglings.

Enables:

Friendly ground units can use the Nydus Network to instantly travel to any other Nydus Network or Nydus Worm owned by the player.

Enables:
- Nydus Worm
Sends units to the designated point. Workers rallied to resources will begin harvesting automatically.
Loads units into the Nydus Network.
Nydus Worms have 3 armor when emerging from the ground.

Summons a Nydus Worm at the target location.
Friendly ground units can use a Nydus Worm to instantly travel to any other Nydus Worm or Nydus Network owned by the player. Grows creep used to feed nearby Zerg structures.

Can attack ground units.
Uproots the Spine Crawler. An uprooted Spine Crawler has the ability to move but cannot attack. Moves much faster on creep.

Can attack air units.
Detector
Uproots the Spore Crawler. An uprooted Spore Crawler has the ability to move but cannot attack. Moves much faster on creep.

Can attack ground and air units.

Anti-ground ambusher. Has a spine attack that damages all enemy units in its line of fire.

Can attack ground units.
Must burrow to attack.

Air unit. Bounces its shot to strike multiple targets.

Can attack ground and air units.
The Mutalisk regenerates life faster than most zerg units.

Heavy assault beast. Has an area-damage attack.

Can attack ground units.
Immune to snare, stun, and mind control effects.

Assault unit. Regenerates life quickly when burrowed. Can morph into a Ravager.

Can attack ground units.

Ranged artillery. Can use Corrosive Bile.

Can attack ground units.
The Roach regenerates life very quickly while burrowed.
Infestation specialist. Can use the Fungal Growth, Infested Terran, and Neural Parasite abilities.
Buries the unit underground. Burrowed units are unable to attack, but they cannot be seen without detection. This unit may move while burrowed.

Target unit is controlled by the Infestor for 11 seconds. The Infestor cannot take any other action while controlling an enemy unit.

Channeled ability.
Immobilizes target units and causes 25 damage over 3 seconds. Reveals cloaked and burrowed units.
Creates a shroud that obscures ground units underneath, reducing damage taken from air units by 50%. Lasts 11 seconds.

Anti-air flyer. Can use Caustic Spray. Can morph into a Brood Lord.

Can attack air units.

Emits a stream of acid that deals 7 damage per second for 4.3 seconds, then increases to 35 damage per second.

Channeled ability. Can only target enemy structures.

Flying heavy-assault unit. Shoots Broodlings at its target. A Broodling is a small creature that can attack ground units.

Can attack ground units.
This cocoon contains a Corruptor that is morphing into a Brood Lord.

The Brood Lord shoots Broodlings at its target. A Broodling is a small creature that can attack ground units.

Can attack ground units.
Returns the unit to the surface.

Basic worker unit. Can harvest minerals and vespene gas. Can mutate into structures.

Can attack ground units.
Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Target Hatchery, Lair, or Hive spawns 4 Larvae in 29 seconds. If Hatchery, Lair, or Hive has more than 3 Larvae at one time, regular Larva production will stop until there are fewer than 3 Larvae.
Instantly restores 125 life to target biological unit or structure.

A burrowed creep generator. Creep feeds nearby Zerg structures. A Creep Tumor can spawn one additional Creep Tumor.

Bonus: Zerg move faster on creep.
This cocoon contains an Overlord as it is morphing into an Overseer.

Advanced aerial observer. Maintains the unit cap set by the Overlord. Can use the Spawn Changeling and Contaminate abilities.

Detector

Creates a Changeling. Changelings cannot attack and die after 107 seconds. When a Changeling first encounters an enemy unit, it will match that unit's color and change into a Zealot, Marine, or Zergling, depending on the enemy race.
The target structure will be unable to train units or research upgrades for 21 seconds.
Grants the Overseer 25% wider vision, but removes its ability to move. This ability can be canceled after activation.

Defensive stronghold.
Used to receive gathered resources.

Can attack ground units.
Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Loads nearby SCVs into the Planetary Fortress.
Primary structure. Used to train SCVs and receive gathered resources. Can use the Scanner Sweep ability. Can use the abilities Calldown: MULE and Calldown: Extra Supplies.

Drops an experimental robotic MULE miner onto the target Mineral Field. MULEs collect minerals more quickly than SCVs.

MULEs last 64 seconds before their systems fail.
Drops additional supplies, permanently increasing the supply output of the target Supply Depot by 8.
Reveals an area of the map, detecting cloaked and burrowed units. Lasts 9 seconds.
Enables warp in of Protoss ground units.
Transforms this Warp Gate back to a Gateway.
Primary structure. Must land to receive resources, produce units, or use abilities.
Immobile power provider. Can load and unload units. Can switch to a mobile Transport Mode.
Reverts the Warp Prism back to Transport Mode, allowing it to move.

A burrowed creep generator. Creep feeds nearby Zerg structures.

Bonus: Zerg move faster on creep.

A burrowed creep generator. Creep feeds nearby Zerg structures. A Creep Tumor can spawn one additional Creep Tumor.

Bonus: Zerg move faster on creep.
Uprooted anti-ground defensive structure. Can move when uprooted, but cannot attack. Must plant itself in creep to attack.
Roots the Spine Crawler. A rooted Spine Crawler has the ability to attack ground units but is unable to move.
Uprooted anti-air defensive structure. Can move when uprooted, but cannot attack. Must plant itself in creep to attack.
Roots the Spore Crawler. A rooted Spore Crawler has the ability to attack air units and detect cloaked units, but it's unable to move.

Powerful psionic attacker.

Can attack ground and air units.

Friendly ground units can use a Nydus Worm to instantly travel to any other Nydus Worm or Nydus Network owned by the player. Grows creep used to feed nearby Zerg structures.

Bonus: Zerg move faster on creep.
Loads units into the Nydus Worm.

Fast melee creature that will last for a short duration.

Can attack ground units.
Workers can harvest minerals from this Mineral Field at a faster rate than normal.
Orders selected units to ignore enemies that are within range.
Orders selected units to fire at will.
Increases the attack range of <font color="#ffff8a">Lurkers</font> by +3.
Reduces the time <font color="#ffff8a">Lurkers</font> take to burrow from 2 seconds to 1.07 seconds and increases their movement speed.
Buries the Lurker underground. Burrowed Lurkers are unable to move, but are able to attack. They cannot be seen without detection.

Contains an upgrade for Lurkers.

Enables:
- Lurkers from Hydralisks
This cocoon contains a Hydralisk that is morphing into a Lurker.

Nydus Destroyer has a ranged attack that can attack air and ground structures.

Attacks structures only.

Provides supply.
Supply allows you to create more units.
Loads units into the Overlord's ventral sacs.

Launch a missile at the target location, dealing 60 damage to all units in the area upon impact.

Can destroy Protoss Force Fields.

Can attack ground units.

Provides vision of the area surrounding the Xel'Naga Tower. Can only be activated by ground units.

Charges the Oracle's Pulsar Beam and allows it to attack enemy ground units.

Drains 2 energy per second.
Deactivates the Oracle's Pulsar Beam and prevents it from attacking.

Places a cloaked Stasis Ward at the target location. Once activated by an enemy ground unit, the ward traps nearby enemies in stasis for 21 seconds. Trapped units cannot be attacked or affected by abilities.
Improves the Tempest's weapon to deal +0 damage vs structures.
Hatches into an Infested Terran after a short period.

Burrows the Widow Mine and readies its weapon. Cannot move while activated.

Attacks by launching missiles at enemy ground and air units that get too close. Missiles deal 125 (+35 vs. shields) damage to their primary target, and 40 (+40 vs. shields) splash damage to units nearby.

Cooldown: 29 seconds.
This unit is no longer revealed while reloading.
Deploys into Defender Mode. In this mode Liberators inflict single target damage to ground units. Liberators in this mode cannot move.

Can attack ground units.

Latches onto the target structure, dealing 150 damage and restoring 3.5 energy to the Viper every second.

Cannot target allied or enemy structures.
Creates a cloud for 6 seconds that reduces attack range of ground units and structures underneath to melee range.
Pulls target unit to the location of the viper.

Creates a parasitic cloud that deals 90 damage over 7 seconds to the target and enemy air units nearby. If the target dies, the cloud remains in the air where the enemy died until it expires.

Cannot target ground units or structures.
Restores target unit or structure's shields.

Mobile flying caster. Can use Photon Overcharge, Mass Recall, and Time Warp abilities. Can upgrade into the Mothership.

Can attack ground units.
Teleports the Mothership Core and all nearby units owned by the player to the targeted Nexus.
Upgrades into the Mothership. Can use Photon Overcharge, Mass Recall, and Time Warp abilities. Cloaks nearby units and structures.
Energizes the target Nexus's khaydarin crystal, turning it into a powerful long-range weapon for 14 seconds that deals 30 damage.
Warps spacetime within the nearby area. All ground units, air units, and structures within the field will have movement speeds reduced by 35%.
Warps spacetime within the nearby area. All ground units, air units, and structures within the field will have movement speeds increased by 35%.
Warped in over a Vespene Geyser to allow harvesting of vespene gas.
Workers can harvest vespene gas from this Vespene Geyser.
Mutated over a Vespene Geyser to allow harvesting of vespene gas.

Can attack air units.
Detector
Barrier that can be destroyed to allow access to new areas.
Local scavenger known for its echoing nocturnal howl.
Unsightly avian creature that is often found on the battlefield.
Males of this species are known for their plumage and bright colors.
Females of this species are far less impressive than the males that compete for their attention.
Females of this species differ markedly from the more aggressive males.
Males of the species are often hunted for their horns and ferocious tusks.
Females of this species differ markedly from the more aggressive males.
Benign creature that sautees well with butter.
Males of this species are often hunted for their horns and ferocious tusks.
Automaton 2000. The utility bot of choice.
This ferocious predator lacks the natural weaponry to harm military units.
